summary: LEFT FRONT COIL SPRING BROKE IN MY 2000 FORD FOCUS CAUSING THE SPRING TO COME DOWN ON THE TIRE WITH THE FULL WEIGHT OF THE CAR.  THIS COULD HAVE CAUSED A MAJOR ACCIDENT.  I CHECKED RECALLS AND THERE HAVE BEEN NONE FOR THAT SPECIFIC PART.  THERE NEEDS TO BE AN INVESTIGATION SO THAT PEOPLE ARE NOT HURT.   *NLM
